${ModID}:Diverge.NAME: Diverge
${ModID}:Diverge.DESCRIPTION: !GUARD!. NL !WS!.{!M!|>0= NL Next turn, gain !M! Block.}

${ModID}:HeavenlyWrath.NAME: Heavenly Wrath
${ModID}:HeavenlyWrath.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL !WW!{!M!|>0= and increase its dequip damage by !M!}.

${ModID}:WhateverllDo.NAME: Whatever'll Do!
${ModID}:WhateverllDo.DESCRIPTION: Choose to ${ModID}:Wield a random weapon {!Upgrades!|>0=and/}or a random shield.

${ModID}:WieldRandomBoth.NAME: Both
${ModID}:WieldRandomBoth.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Wield a random weapon and a random shield.

${ModID}:TakeAim.NAME: Take Aim
${ModID}:TakeAim.DESCRIPTION: !WW!.{!M!|>0= NL Increase its initial damage by !M!.} NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShovelKnightCard.NAME: shovel knigoht after he',s force to return his shovel to home depot
${ModID}:ShovelKnightCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL {!Upgrades!|0=If it's an Attack, }!GUARD!.

${ModID}:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
${ModID}:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL This turn, ${ModID}:Guards grant Block !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= NL Bear !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Weight.}

${ModID}:Reverberate.NAME: Reverberate
${ModID}:Reverberate.DESCRIPTION: This turn, ${ModID}:Hits deal damage !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}. NL Bear !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Weight.
